46735.<speed=0>\nとりひきの 説明です！\n<br>\n他のプレイヤーのキャ:
This will explain trading!
With trading, players can exchange items and Gold with each other, safely and securely.
Be sure to ask the other player before initiating a trade, though. Common courtesy goes a long way!

92374.とても高額なゴールドの 取り引きです！\n信頼できる相手か よく確認してください:
This trade contains a very large amount of Gold! Please be sure to only trade with those that you trust.
This message will always appear when a trade involving a large amount of Gold is initiated.
Buying and selling in-game items or services for real money (RMT) is prohibited. Such transactions will be punished.
